verses.verse: O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH410>, to whom vengeance <WH5360> belongeth; O 'Elohim <WH410>, to whom vengeance <WH5360> belongeth, shew <WH3313> <WH8685> thyself.
Lift up <WH5375> <WH8734> thyself, thou judge <WH8199> <WH8802> of the earth <WH776>: render <WH7725> <WH8685> a reward <WH1576> to the proud <WH1343>.
YY <WH3068>, how long shall the wicked <WH7563>, how long shall the wicked <WH7563> triumph <WH5937> <WH8799> ?
How long shall they utter <WH5042> <WH8686> and speak <WH1696> <WH8762> hard things <WH6277>? and all the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205> boast <WH559> <WH8691> themselves?
They break in pieces <WH1792> <WH8762> thy people <WH5971>, O YY <WH3068>, and afflict <WH6031> <WH8762> thine heritage <WH5159>.
They slay <WH2026> <WH8799> the widow <WH490> and the stranger <WH1616>, and murder <WH7523> <WH8762> the fatherless <WH3490>.
Yet they say <WH559> <WH8799>, The YY <WH3050> shall not see <WH7200> <WH8799>, neither shall the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290> regard <WH995> <WH8799> it.
Understand <WH995> <WH8798>, ye brutish <WH1197> <WH8802> among the people <WH5971>: and ye fools <WH3684>, when will ye be wise <WH7919> <WH8686> ?
He that planted <WH5193> <WH8802> the ear <WH241>, shall he not hear <WH8085> <WH8799>? he that formed <WH3335> <WH8802> the eye <WH5869>, shall he not see <WH5027> <WH8686> ?
He that chastiseht <WH3256> <WH8802> the heathen <WH1471>, shall not he correct <WH3198> <WH8686>? he that teacheth <WH3925> <WH8764> man <WH120> knowledge <WH1847>, shall not he know ?
The YY <WH3068> knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> the thoughts <WH4284> of man <WH120>, that they are vanity <WH1892>.
Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> whom thou chastenest <WH3256> <WH8762>, O YY <WH3050>, and teachest <WH3925> <WH8762> him out of thy Torah <WH8451>;
That thou mayest give him rest <WH8252> <WH8687> from the days <WH3117> of adversity <WH7451>, until the pit <WH7845> be digged <WH3738> <WH8735> for the wicked <WH7563>.
For the YY <WH3068> will not cast off <WH5203> <WH8799> his people <WH5971>, neither will he forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> his inheritance <WH5159>.
But judgment <WH4941> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto righteousness <WH6664>: and all the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820> shall follow <WH310> it.
Who will rise up <WH6965> <WH8799> for me against the evildoers <WH7489> <WH8688>? or who will stand up <WH3320> <WH8691> for me against the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205> ?
Unless <WH3884> the YY <WH3068> had been my help <WH5833>, my soul <WH5315> had almost <WH4592> dwelt <WH7931> <WH8804> in silence <WH1745>.
When I said <WH559> <WH8804>, My foot <WH7272> slippeth <WH4131> <WH8804>; thy mercy <WH2617>, O YY <WH3068>, held me up <WH5582> <WH8799>.
In the multitude <WH7230> of my thoughts <WH8312> within <WH7130> me thy comforts <WH8575> delight <WH8173> <WH8770> my soul <WH5315>.
Shall the throne <WH3678> of iniquity <WH1942> have fellowship <WH2266> <WH8792> with thee, which frameth <WH3335> <WH8802> mischief <WH5999> by a Torah <WH2706> ?
They gather themselves together <WH1413> <WH8799> against the soul <WH5315> of the righteous <WH6662>, and condemn <WH7561> <WH8686> the innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818>.
But the YY <WH3068> is my defence <WH4869>; and my 'Elohim <WH430> is the rock <WH6697> of my refuge <WH4268>.

And he shall bring <WH7725> <WH8686> upon them their own iniquity <WH205>, and shall cut them off <WH6789> <WH8686> in their own wickedness <WH7451>; yea, the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> shall cut them off <WH6789> <WH8686>.
